title: Oracle's Chamber Adventure #47
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Oracle's Antechamber
rooms.description: A dimly lit chamber with walls covered in ancient symbols that glow faintly with ethereal light. Incense smoke curls through the air, and the sound of distant chanting echoes from somewhere deep within. Stone benches line the walls, and a large ornate chest sits in the corner. A heavy tapestry depicting celestial bodies hangs on the eastern wall.

items.name: carved stone bench
items.description: A bench with intricate carvings of stars and moons

items.name: ancient brass key
items.description: A tarnished brass key with celestial symbols etched into its surface

items.name: ornate wooden chest
items.description: A chest decorated with silver inlays and mystical runes. It has a brass lock.

items.name: scroll of prophecy
items.description: An ancient scroll with faded writing
items.text: The First Prophecy: In the year 777, the Oracle Cassandra foresaw the coming of the Seeker. Three truths must be known: The Oracle's name, the place of visions, and the key to enlightenment.

items.name: stone offering table
items.description: A table with three compartments for sacred offerings

items.name: Oracle's vision journal
items.description: A leather-bound journal filled with prophetic writings
items.text: Journal Entry: I, Oracle Cassandra, record my visions in the Chamber of Mirrors, where truth reflects infinitely. The sacred number of my first great prophecy was 777. Only wisdom can unlock the path forward.

items.name: silver amulet
items.description: A mystical amulet that pulses with inner light

items.name: celestial tapestry
items.description: A large tapestry showing the night sky with constellations
items.text: Woven into the tapestry: 'The stars guide those who seek. The Oracle's wisdom flows from the Chamber of Mirrors to all who are worthy.'

items.name: carved wooden door
items.description: A door carved with images of eyes and stars, leading east

rooms.name: Hall of Prophecies
rooms.description: A long hallway lined with marble columns. The walls are covered with inscriptions of ancient prophecies, each glowing with a different colored light. Crystal orbs float near the ceiling, casting dancing shadows. At the far end, a magnificent door of polished bronze stands closed, covered in mystical questions.

items.name: northern prophecy wall
items.description: A wall inscription glowing with blue light
items.text: The Second Prophecy: The seeker shall find wisdom not in books, but in reflection and meditation. The Oracle speaks truth in the Chamber of Mirrors.

items.name: southern prophecy wall
items.description: A wall inscription glowing with golden light
items.text: The Third Prophecy: Three paths lead to enlightenment - Knowledge of the self, Understanding of the cosmos, and Acceptance of fate. These are the pillars of wisdom.

items.name: marble pedestal
items.description: A pedestal holding a crystal sphere

items.name: book of Oracle's teachings
items.description: A tome containing the Oracle's wisdom
items.text: The Teachings of Cassandra: To achieve enlightenment, one must embrace wisdom. Wisdom comes from understanding the three pillars: knowledge, understanding, and acceptance. Only through wisdom can one reach the inner sanctum.

items.name: floating crystal orbs
items.description: Mystical orbs that float and glow with inner light

items.name: meditation scroll
items.text: Guide to Meditation: The Oracle Cassandra teaches that true visions come in the Chamber of Mirrors, where one sees not just the reflection of the body, but the reflection of the soul.

items.name: bronze door to inner sanctum
items.description: A magnificent door inscribed with three questions that glow with mystical energy

password_questions.question: What is the Oracle's name?
password_questions.hint: Check the prophecy scroll and the vision journal

password_questions.question: Where does the Oracle receive visions?
password_questions.hint: Multiple texts mention where the Oracle sees truth

password_questions.question: What unlocks the path to enlightenment?
password_questions.hint: The Oracle's teachings explain what leads to enlightenment

rooms.name: Oracle's Inner Sanctum
rooms.description: You have entered the sacred heart of the Oracle's Chamber! The room is circular, with walls made entirely of mirrors that reflect infinite versions of yourself. In the center, a pool of crystal-clear water glows with divine light. Above, the ceiling opens to reveal the stars themselves. A sense of profound peace and enlightenment washes over you. The Oracle's presence can be felt all around, welcoming you as one who has proven worthy.

items.name: pool of divine water
items.description: A pool that shows visions of past, present, and future in its shimmering surface

items.name: infinite mirrors
items.description: Mirrors that reflect not just your image, but your true self
items.text: As you gaze into the mirrors, you see yourself as you truly are - a seeker who has found wisdom through perseverance and understanding.

items.name: Oracle's throne
items.description: An empty throne of white marble, waiting for the next Oracle to claim it

rooms.win_message: You have reached the Oracle's Inner Sanctum and proven yourself worthy! The mirrors show you visions of your future, filled with wisdom and enlightenment. The Oracle's voice echoes through the chamber: 'You have passed the trials and demonstrated true understanding. You are now blessed with the gift of insight.' The chamber fills with brilliant light, and you feel transformed by the experience. You win!
